English.Text: Your feeble bunch finally edge open the heavy door, only to find the building deserted. That it is owned by the Pyrphorians there is no doubt. Carmine drapes smother the windows, and your people find themselves picking over the cult's instruments, whose purpose is unsettlingly opaque. "What's this oily liquid on the floor," someone says, just as the door slams shut, and is followed by the hasty rattle of padlock and keys. The Pyrphorian fire will burn bright and long at the quayside this night. Only one of your crew return home.
